00037  SUBROUTINE MemAlloc(FLAG)
00038 
00039 !  Common Variables
00040  USE Domain
00041  USE FluidParams, ONLY : p, phi, u
00042  USE LBMParams,   ONLY : f, fdim, g, gdim
00043  USE MPIParams
00044  IMPLICIT NONE
00045 
00046  !   Input/Output Parameters
00047  INTEGER, INTENT (IN) :: FLAG
00048 
00049 
00050  IF(FLAG == 1) THEN
00051 
00052 ! Hydrodynamics arrays
00053    ALLOCATE( p(xl:xu,yl:yu) )
00054    ALLOCATE( u(xl:xu,yl:yu,2) )
00055    ALLOCATE( phi(xlg:xug,ylg:yug) )
00056 
00057 ! Distribution function arrays
00058    ALLOCATE( f(xlg:xug,ylg:yug,0:fdim,0:1) )
00059    ALLOCATE( g(xlg:xug,ylg:yug,0:gdim,0:1) )
00060 
00061 ! Neighbor list array
00062    ALLOCATE( ni(xlg:xug,ylg:yug,1:4) )
00063 
00064 ! Allocation for exchange of data in the x direction
00065    xsize  = yu - yl + 1
00066    xsize2 = xsize + xsize
00067    xsize3 = xsize2 + xsize
00068 
00069    ALLOCATE( phi_west_snd(1:xsize) )
00070    ALLOCATE( phi_east_snd(1:xsize) )
00071    ALLOCATE( phi_west_rcv(1:xsize) )
00072    ALLOCATE( phi_east_rcv(1:xsize) )
00073 
00074    ALLOCATE( f_west_snd(1:xsize) )
00075    ALLOCATE( f_east_snd(1:xsize) )
00076    ALLOCATE( f_west_rcv(1:xsize) )
00077    ALLOCATE( f_east_rcv(1:xsize) )
00078 
00079    ALLOCATE( g_west_snd(1:xsize3) )
00080    ALLOCATE( g_east_snd(1:xsize3) )
00081    ALLOCATE( g_west_rcv(1:xsize3) )
00082    ALLOCATE( g_east_rcv(1:xsize3) )
00083 
00084 ! Allocation for exchange of data in the y direction
00085    ysize  = xu - xl + 1
00086    ysize2 = ysize + ysize
00087    ysize3 = ysize2 + ysize
00088 
00089    ALLOCATE( phi_south_snd(1:ysize) )
00090    ALLOCATE( phi_north_snd(1:ysize) )
00091    ALLOCATE( phi_south_rcv(1:ysize) )
00092    ALLOCATE( phi_north_rcv(1:ysize) )
00093 
00094    ALLOCATE( f_south_snd(1:ysize) )
00095    ALLOCATE( f_north_snd(1:ysize) )
00096    ALLOCATE( f_south_rcv(1:ysize) )
00097    ALLOCATE( f_north_rcv(1:ysize) )
00098 
00099    ALLOCATE( g_south_snd(1:ysize3) )
00100    ALLOCATE( g_north_snd(1:ysize3) )
00101    ALLOCATE( g_south_rcv(1:ysize3) )
00102    ALLOCATE( g_north_rcv(1:ysize3) )
00103 
00104  ELSE
00105 
00106    DEALLOCATE( f )
00107    DEALLOCATE( g )
00108    DEALLOCATE( ni )
00109    DEALLOCATE( phi )
00110    DEALLOCATE( p )
00111    DEALLOCATE( u )
00112    DEALLOCATE( f_west_snd )
00113    DEALLOCATE( f_west_rcv )
00114    DEALLOCATE( f_east_snd )
00115    DEALLOCATE( f_east_rcv )
00116    DEALLOCATE( g_west_snd )
00117    DEALLOCATE( g_east_snd )
00118    DEALLOCATE( g_west_rcv )
00119    DEALLOCATE( g_east_rcv )
00120    DEALLOCATE( phi_west_snd )
00121    DEALLOCATE( phi_west_rcv )
00122    DEALLOCATE( phi_east_snd )
00123    DEALLOCATE( phi_east_rcv )
00124    DEALLOCATE( f_south_snd )
00125    DEALLOCATE( f_south_rcv )
00126    DEALLOCATE( f_north_snd )
00127    DEALLOCATE( f_north_rcv )
00128    DEALLOCATE( g_south_snd )
00129    DEALLOCATE( g_south_rcv )
00130    DEALLOCATE( g_north_snd )
00131    DEALLOCATE( g_north_rcv )
00132    DEALLOCATE( phi_south_snd )
00133    DEALLOCATE( phi_south_rcv )
00134    DEALLOCATE( phi_north_snd )
00135    DEALLOCATE( phi_north_rcv )
00136 
00137  END IF
00138 
00139  RETURN
00140  END SUBROUTINE MemAlloc
